thread.section_title: Personalized Paper Manufacturing Group Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Personalized Paper Manufacturing Group | printpps.com | 2 of 53
thread.title: Amber
thread.title_full: Personalized Paper Manufacturing Group reviewed by Amber

author: Amber
title: Amber
text:
I received great customer service from PPMG! I placed an order and they reached out to me within 12 hours to let me know my order wouldn't get to me in time, and here's what we needed to do. I placed a second order with them and was able to contact someone every time I emailed or called, nowadays that is very hard to do.
I would recommend them to anyone looking for high quality, professional looking products!
